item.title: Initial Commit
item.description: There is no starting or stopping, only doing

item.title: About
item.description: Aleksey (Oleksii) Potapov is iOS Developer, developing iOS apps since 2012. Contacts E-mail: ing.aleksey.potapov@gmail.com LinkedIn Github Stackoverflow Twitter Medium Codementor Story I started studying iOS ecosystem in 2012. This became something like a hobby for me. Later in summer 2013 I started my career at Mobindustry Corp. There I developed application for runners, a festival app along with some other outsource apps. While studying at National Mining University, I had a chance to attend the summer school at Koblenz-Landau University.

item.title: Career
item.description: Resumé View resumé in PDF LeoVegas iOS Developer — Sept 2021 - present Company website LeoVegas iOS apps My responsibility: Games integration GraphQL managing Features: Apollo GraphQL, CircleCi, Swift, Promises Sygic iOS Developer — Aug 2017 - Sept 2021 Company website Sygic GPS Navigation and Car Navigation apps My responsibility: Apple CarPlay integration 3rd party frameworks integration: Bosch MySpin, SmartDeviceLink, Pioneer SDK SwiftLint integration Car Connectivity logic migration from app to app Objective-C to Swift migration Features: Navigation, CoreLocation, Objective-C, Swift, RxSwift, MVVM, BLE Official website
